page.title:
A Reminder
A Reminder
page.enlisting:
• Quality of drug products available to the US (specifications/controls; GMP; testing,..) is able to prevent the release of low quality product • Very few Class I recalls due to quality problems • Current level of process understanding is low and, therefore, requires a very high level of scrutiny and rejecting product of unacceptable • Quality of drug products available to the US
